body.text:
Please put a hold on this order until further notice.

The material that just arrived at our warehouse in Greenville is not water white, it appears to have an orange tint to it.
The warehouse is taking pictures and sending a sample to out lab for testing.

We need to resolve this issue before we have anymore material ship.


Fred George  |  Business Manager Organics
104 Pheasant Run, Suite 104, Newtown, PA 18940
Phone: 603-305-6721
fred@connectionchemical.com<mailto:fred@connectionchemical.com>  |  www.connectionchemical.com<http://www.connectionchemical.com/>
Office: 215-493-4240    orders@connectionchemical.com<mailto:orders@connectionchemical.com>

[cid:image001.jpg@01DC0D01.C95D5E20]

Dear Linda,



Good Afternoon!



Please find attached the following documents for your reference.



  *   Revised Proforma Invoice (PI)
  *   Draft Bill of Lading (BL)
  *   Draft Packing List
  *   Draft Commercial Invoice



Kindly review the documents and let us know if any changes are required so we can update them accordingly.



Additionally, we request you to share the signed copy of the PI.



Looking forward to your confirmation.

Dear Linda,

Good Afternoon !

Thank you for new purchase order.

We acknowledge receipt of your purchase order. We will share PI by tomorrow.

Let us know if you need any further assistance.

Hello,

A new order is attached:  PO 57034 for Matpers FT 505 (Gefrax OP 10) in 1000 kg totes, to sail by September 1st into Charleston, SC.

Please confirm receipt.



Linda Campbell
Logistics Coordinator - Connection Chemical, LP
104 Pheasant Run, Suite 104
Newtown, PA  18940
Phone:   215-259-5059
Fax:  215-493-3801
Linda@ConnectionChemical.com<mailto:Linda@ConnectionChemical.com>   |   www.connectionchemical.com<http://www.connectionchemical.com/>

[Signature Logo]


**Note - Our banking information has not changed. Please do not change any payment or banking information unless you have confirmed the change with our accounting department.**
